item.description:
This group has been specially formed for entertainers and professionals actively involved in the entertainment industry. Artists, writers, filmmakers, musicians, please come and share your ideas, questions and concerns with other like-minded professionals and receive valuable advice.

This month, I'd like to open the floor back up and invite all of you to submit discussion questions/points you may want to hit. Are you facing a specific concern that you'd like to address with a group and get some input or advice? We'd love to hear it! Discussion points may include:

- How far can DIY go today? Are you DIY? How is it working for you? Or, did you make a decision to bring on personnel (i.e. a manager, marketing guru, etc) and what motivated that decision?

- Is national distribution of music and/or film necessary in today's digital world?

- Guerrilla/viral marketing campaigns: Why or why not?

- Corporate sponsorship and artistic integrity: Impossible to marry?

Looking forward to seeing all of you there!
item.name: Revolve Nation Entertainment Roundtable & Networking Group
